title: harfbuzz build error: "ImportError: No module named six/site"
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
Another system installed gtk-docs related issue.
For python@2.7 we get "no module named six" error
For python@3.7 we get "no module named site"

```console
$ spack install harfbuzz 
...
3 errors found in build log:
     646      File "/usr/bin/gtkdoc-rebase", line 28, in <module>
     647        from gtkdoc import common, config, rebase
     648      File "/usr/share/gtk-doc/python/gtkdoc/common.py", line 31, in <module>
     649        import six
     650    ImportError: No module named six
     651    Makefile:818: recipe for target 'install-data-local' failed
  >> 652    make[2]: *** [install-data-local] Error 1
     653    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/user/spack-stage/spack-stage-gh3BnT/harfbuzz-1.4.6/docs'
     654    Makefile:577: recipe for target 'install-am' failed
  >> 655    make[1]: *** [install-am] Error 2
     656    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/user/spack-stage/spack-stage-gh3BnT/harfbuzz-1.4.6/docs'
     657    Makefile:489: recipe for target 'install-recursive' failed
  >> 658    make: *** [install-recursive] Error 1
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux somehost 4.15.0-38-generic #41-Ubuntu SMP Wed Oct 10 10:59:38 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Linux Mint 19 Tara (=Ubuntu 18.04.1)
```
